module.title: Helper function
module.description: Various helper function to extend other checks.
module.name: CheckHelpers

check_always_ok.description: Run another check and regardless of its return code return OK.

check_always_warning.description: Run another check and regardless of its return code return WARNING.

check_always_critical.description: Run another check and regardless of its return code return CRITICAL.

check_multi.description: Run more then one check and return the worst state.

check_ok.description: Just return OK (anything passed along will be used as a message).

check_warning.description: Just return WARNING (anything passed along will be used as a message).

check_critical.description: Just return CRITICAL (anything passed along will be used as a message).

check_negate.description: Run a check and alter the return status codes according to arguments.

check_timeout.description: Run a check and timeout after a given amount of time if the check has not returned.
